name: "Sly 2" - Where Are They Now? (PS2) Online Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Now that Sly Cooper has escaped, what is Carmelita doing now?
options: Searching for the entire Cooper gang
questions.explanation:
Searching for Sly Cooper.

	At the end of the video, Carmelita says "I'll find you, Sly Cooper!"  In the credits, it mentions that she has still been trying to search for and arrest Sly.  Carmelita is a cop from Interpol.  She is found in every single "Sly Cooper" game, and wants to arrest him and the gang.

questions.text: When Sly jumped out of the helicopter after talking with Carmelita, where did he go?
questions.explanation:
It is unknown.

	In the credits, it is mentioned that Carmelita continues to search for Sly Cooper, whose whereabouts are unknown.  We have no idea where he went!  You will not find out until you play the third game, either!  Carmelita is angry at Sly, although she secretly likes him, just like he likes her.  She had fun talking to Sly in the helicopter, too.

On a cruise ship.

	Dimitri is now living happy on a cruise ship.  You will encounter him during the next game, when he joins you to find his grandfather's scuba outfit.  Dimitri still wears his "greasy sweet" suit, and the ladies thinks it is sexy.  Dimitri is a purple lizard.

questions.text: What does Dimitri DO at his new location?
questions.explanation:
He is a dance instructor.

	Dimitri is a dance instructor on a cruise ship.  He enjoys his job because he gets to hang around with a lot of women.  These women find his suit to be sexy.  He learned to talk by watching rap music videos.  That is why he talks to strangely.

questions.text: What kind of chain does Rajan now own?
questions.explanation:
Rug outlets.

	Rajan has become a very successful rug seller.  He sells only the finest Indian crafted rugs.  He is happy selling rugs.  He has earned a lot of money, and he didn't have to process illegal spices to do so!

questions.text: In what continent are Rajan's stores located?
questions.explanation:
North America.

	His rug outlets have spred all across North America, from California to Maine!  His rugs are very popular, and he has become very successful in selling these rugs.  They are all Indian crafted, India being his native land.  After all, Rajan is an Indian tiger!

questions.text: Where did the Contessa move to?
questions.explanation:
Milwaukie.

	If you paid close attention, you can see that the Contessa moved to "MilwaukIE," and not "MilwaukEE."  She has become very successful at what she does there.  She is earning money, and she enjoys it much more than she did in taking in criminals and hypnotizing them with spice. I am very surprised no one is afraid of her...

questions.text: What is the Contessa's new job where she now lives?
questions.explanation:
Real estate agent.

	The Contessa has become the best real estate agent that Milwaukie has ever known.  She has become very rich and successful, something she failed at doing when she was evil!  The Contessa did not remarry, so she can't possibly be a mom!  In her previously life of acquiring riches, she would marry rich men and kill them to inherit their money.  So she is a several timed widowed black widow!

questions.text: What organization did Jean Bison join?
questions.explanation:
EPA.

	Although we do not learn what EPA stands for, we do know it has to do with saving animals.  He rescues baby animals from all sorts of dangers.  He enjoys his job, saving animals as opposed to transporting illegal spices!

questions.text: What was the ultimate fate of Jean Bison?
questions.explanation:
He was re-frozen.

	Jean Bison was on a mission to save baby penguins.  They were already in the life raft when he fell in the water and re-froze.  Nobody knows when he will be thawed out again...
